MAIN_MESSAGE: It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety at 10:48PM in the LL29 postcode area of Colwyn Bay following reports of a safety issue. This may affect the supply to your property. Our engineers have arrived on site and will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 01:30PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:10PM on 4th April 2021.
